“One sec,” You say. “I'm going up there.”

“You're just going to walk right by?” Nel asks.

You push past Andor and make your way up the steps. He seems a bit too busy to care.

As you reach the top step—more like a stone pedestal—you find yourself bathed in a radiant light from above. There's a sense of wanting, a pressing feeling of necessity. The girl stands before you with outstretched arms, and though you don't believe you have what you're meant to, you feel compelled to make an offering.

You interact with the Altar, and a context menu unfolds before you.

> [[ Greater Celestial Materialization Altar ]]
> Celestial Manifestation “Averron City”
> MANIFESTATION GRANTED BY:
Andor, Liza, and Ayla, “that these newborn souls might have an origin point from which to forge their destiny”
> [[ Offer Celestial Gems ]]
* Create Celestial Artifact
* Enhance Celestial Artifact
* Enhance Celestial Manifestation
* Destroy Celestial Manifestation
> [[ Offer Item ]]
* Offer an Item to the Celestials
